column2:
"Wow, thank you very much! I was
surprised that you are able to get the
material based on the conditions!"

"With this, I'm sure I can restore the
kitchen stove back to its original form...
Yes, or even better!"

"The kitchen stove is the fire of life.
You are really a saviour of the kitchen!"

"Thank you very much!
Please help me again when I need you!"

"わー、ありがとう！
まさか本当に条件通りの物を
持ってきてくれるなんて！"

"これさえあれば
きっと厨房のコンロも元通り……
ううん、それ以上になってくれるはず！"

"厨房のコンロはまさに命の火。
あなたは厨房の命の恩人ね！"

"本当にありがとう！
なにかあったら次もよろしくね！"
